column1: Uchi////The ambiance is really nice and there's modern furniture. It's a nice spot for hanging with friends
column3: or dinner celebration. The events manager Jessica B. came by and greeted us. She took time to show us their private meeting room. It was really nice
column4: spacious and had a TV hidden behind the wall that could be used for a meeting or a private event. They also host sushi making group classes upon request. She then told us a little bit about the food they offer and that we would be in good hands with our waitress.
